entry.title: Restarting the Blog
entry.summary: After a long hiatus, the Chisel developers are restarting the Chisel blog.
entry.content:
It's been many years since the Chisel project had a blog. In the spirit of New Year's resolutions (and more pragmatically as a means to better communicate with the open source community about Chisel), the Chisel developers are restarting the blog.

In the future look for posts by Chisel users and developers about new features, the rationale behind existing features, and more communication about the broad direction of Chisel.
